verses.text: “\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* loved \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* out \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*. \w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Baals|strong="H1168"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w burned|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w engraved|strong="H6456"\w* \w images|strong="H6456"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w taught|strong="H3045"\w* Ephraim \w to|strong="H5921"\w* walk. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* didn’t \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w drew|strong="H4900"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* ties \w of|strong="H5921"\w* love; \w and|strong="H4900"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* who \w lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* necks; \w and|strong="H4900"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w bent|strong="H5186"\w* \w down|strong="H5186"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H4900"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* fed \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

“\w They|strong="H3588"\w* won’t \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Assyrian \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w repent|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3615"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w fall|strong="H2342"\w* \w on|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3615"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* bars \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3615"\w* gates, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w put|strong="H3615"\w* \w an|strong="H3615"\w* \w end|strong="H3615"\w* \w to|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3615"\w* plans.

\w My|strong="H7311"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* determined \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w turn|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*. Though \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* Most \w High|strong="H7311"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w certainly|strong="H3808"\w* won’t \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

“How can \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, Ephraim? How can \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? How can \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* Admah? How can \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w Zeboiim|strong="H6636"\w*? \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* compassion \w is|strong="H3820"\w* aroused.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w anger|strong="H2740"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* Ephraim, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* man—\w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2740"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w trembling|strong="H2729"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H2729"\w* \w trembling|strong="H2729"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dove|strong="H3123"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Assyria; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w settle|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*,” \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
Ephraim surrounds me with falsehood, and the house of Israel with deceit. Judah still strays from God, and is unfaithful to the Holy One.
